about_the_game:
Backgroundstory

Stars, galaxies, and nebulae are all shrouded in the black veil of emptiness. At the tip of the warp, the starry light is eternal and sings an unfinished song. Waiting for the veil to be lifted, a vast river of stars, flowing into the ashes. This worldly miracle, the universe sent a gift - a perfect 20-sided body about 30m high landed silently and peacefully. COSMIC, the largest non-governmental scientific organization on the astral plane, quickly blocked the site and formed a team to explore and study it, and named it UD3718. Sudden cosmic strange glory, the black hole civilization's surprise attack warning, the anti-technology side of the revolutionary crisis, the deranged experimental report. As a researcher, you, miallai, will get to know your companions, work together, step by step to explore the unknown field, break through the limitations of space and time, to see the bright civilization.

Gamefeatures


This game is a 2.5D horizontal role-playing game with the theme of science fiction. Playing this game, you can enjoy a femslash ship, feel the charm of science fiction, and reveal a bold and hardcore science fiction world.

Backgroundstory

Stars, galaxies, and nebulae are all shrouded in the black veil of emptiness. At the tip of the warp, the starry light is eternal and sings an unfinished song. Waiting for the veil to be lifted, a vast river of stars, flowing into the ashes. This worldly miracle, the universe sent a gift - a perfect 20-sided body about 30m high landed silently and peacefully. COSMIC, the largest non-governmental scientific organization on the astral plane, quickly blocked the site and formed a team to explore and study it, and named it UD3718. Sudden cosmic strange glory, the black hole civilization's surprise attack warning, the anti-technology side of the revolutionary crisis, the deranged experimental report. As a researcher, you, miallai, will get to know your companions, work together, step by step to explore the unknown field, break through the limitations of space and time, to see the bright civilization.

Gamefeatures


This game is a 2.5D horizontal role-playing game with the theme of science fiction. Playing this game, you can enjoy a femslash ship, feel the charm of science fiction, and reveal a bold and hardcore science fiction world.
name: 终末列车Demo迷途
short_description: 《MlikwaySubway》 is a sci-fi 2.5D RPG.Players need to play the role of scientific researchers Miallai, explore the vast universe, go through thick and thin together with Octo，see the truth of the "ashes", and ultimately continue the flame of civilization.
